I am 88 years old and no longer drive, the only ways by which I could collect are by hourly train + 'bus (3 hrs inc return  journey) or by a one-and-a-half mile walk to the appropriate 'bus route, an infrequent service, then a change of 'bus in town (half a day or more) or taxi.  Current fuel costs mean a taxi fare amounting to £50-80 at least.  A one way courier option by the taxi firm is not available and would, in any case, have presented problems with ID papers at collection.

Review.Titre: OEM denies Campbell Miller Tools claim of toolboxes
Review.Contenu: I was suspicious of being sent second hand goods rather than new as advertised. Campbell Miller Tools did not respond to email complaint about this for some time. Their response eventually was that apparently Bosch routinely send them not ‘second hand’ toolboxes, but ‘new’ boxes coincidentally labelled in multiple places for unrelated products. As these were not ‘new’ products in appearance I requested that they be replaced but Campbell Miller do not agree. This is a factual account of my experience and should not be removed from Trustpilot just because it is awkward reading. Bosch themselves do not accept that they send out new boxes with irrelevant labelling and are now following up on the apparent ‘repurposing’ of boxes by Campbell Miller Tools.

Review.Titre: Arrived in damaged box, inadequate packing ?
Review.Contenu: The on-line purchasing experience was good and the speed of delivery was very good.However the hedge trimmer was delivered in just its own Bosch standard box and the box was damaged and open at one end. That end did not even have any sellotape on it to help to keep it secure and just relied on the cardboard push in flaps. Hence the hedgetrimmer could just drop out of the box.To me, this level of packaging is totally inadequate and unacceptable. I contacted Campbell Miller who advised that they ship 30 a week in similar packing and have not experienced this problem before.I have tried the hedgetrimmer in the house and it makes all the correct sounds and so I'll keep it but I am not happy with how it was despatched and think Campbell Miller need to review their process.

CMT also stated that they apologised at every stage, this is not true either, again, i have every email to prove it, i even had to ask them for an apology. Review.Titre: Extremely Slow Delivery. Failed to send multiple times, item out of stock then just sheer incompetence.
Review.Contenu: I ordered an item online with a promise of delivery within 48 hours. When the item didn't arrive I called Campbell Miller Tools to enquire as to its whereabouts, only to be told that it wasn't in stock and they were waiting on a delivery. I asked why they had accepted an order for an item that was out of stock and I was told it was a mistake. Fair enough, I said and suggested that it would have been good customer service to have called me rather than leaving it for me to call them.I was told that the item should be arriving in their warehouse sometime in the next 2 or maybe 3 days and that they would call me as soon as it had arrived. Again I didn't get a call so I had to chase CMT. I was told that the item had arrived and would be posted out for next day delivery. Great!Next day and again no delivery. I called CMT again. This time, the warehouse were at fault as they had forgotten to post the item. Another promise of next day delivery before 12pm which CMT very generously were not going to charge me for, and Saturday deliveries cost them extra don't you know.Saturday noon came and went and no delivery. I called DPD, CMT's delivery company of choice, to ask what had happened, only to be told that CMT had not processed the order in time for it to make the next day delivery service and that it would be delivered the following day.I finally have the item, a week later than anticipated, and I'm very happy with it, but I am very disappointed with the level of competence and customer service that Campbell Miller Tools offered. As an e-commerce business maintaining stock levels and an efficient delivery service should be paramount. Then when the odd mistake happens these should be quickly and efficiently rectified. My order and delivery were a catalogue of errors followed up with a request to share my experience of TrustPilot. So here we are.Personally, if I were to buy this item online again I'd use someone else (i can't mention who), who offer an efficient and reliable ordering and delivery service.

Review.Titre: Failed to deliver on promised service.
Review.Contenu: I received a request today to write a review, so I was surprised to learn I was "out of date" because over 12 months had passed!! While my goods arrived eventually, they took twice the time promised on the order confirmation. That confirmation also said "Once we ship your order we will send you a dispatch email along with the tracking number." No such e-mail was received. Bearing in mind the spelling errors on the co. website, I was beginning to think I had been scammed by a rogue trader. No problem with the product, when received, or the price, but the promised service was not delivered.

I have ordered a screwdriver set, and have been sent something completely different. Trying to get in touch via Facebook and email however not receiving anything back from them. I am sure it will be resolved when I can get in touch with the company.

Finally arrived and happy with the product, but very disappointed with the lack of communication. An offer of my 6 quid express delivery charge as compensation doesn't touch my losses. (DPD had great communication with the delivery once they finally received my order) I fully understand that things go wrong at times, but prior communication could have meant I would of had time to adjust our work schedule to accommodate.

Put quite simply, my saw still hasn't arrived. the advert said 2 working days but that hasn't happened and I've received nothing in the way of explanation or apology. The fact that you've sent me a chance to review your service seemingly unaware that you have yet to fulfil the crucial element of said service is somewhat less than impressive. Incidentally, I'm away for the next few days so, should my reciprocating saw actually materialise, could you please not send it via a delivery service that leaves it under my side gate clearly visible to passers-by but with my neighbours at No. 107?

I followed up with an email to confirm that it would be delivered the next day (as I had to arrange to be in) but was told that they were out of stock. Checked the website again, still said it's in stock. Now, a week later, website is still showing stock but I have yet to receive the item, despite being promised three days running that it will arrive. Not once did they send me an update - I had the ask for an update every time. Prices may be good but that's pretty pointless if they are so incompetent that the item never actually gets to you.

Review.Titre: Shouldn't offer for sale item shown as in stock when not.
Review.Contenu: Bought an item after discussing it on the phone then after placing order told it was out of stock with no indication, if or when, it would be in stock.  Offered 2 unsuitable substitutes.  No friction  - just inefficient.
Impact driver is a very impressive tool but I was expecting it to arrive with a carton as stated on the website but it didn’t. Won’t buy from this seller again as giving misleading information

I was looking to buy a Bosch hedgecutter on the internet and googled type and model CM tools appeared and was best price.I ordered and received product only to find it arrived without a battery and charger and ofcourse I was very disappointed and rang CM tools.They pointed out that I hadn't read the ad correctly and they were not responsible for way Google laid out and promoted their products and the error was mine.I had 2 choices return the product or buy the battery and charger.I opted to buy.My point is that the whole experience could have been far more pleasant if the operator had apologised and simply used his empathy and been on my side as well as his companies as I felt that it was all my mistake.
I bought a new Bosch table saw and stand, only received the stand and no one has got back to me to tell me where my saw is or offered me a refund!!! Complete lack of communication and no answers!!

Review.Titre: Having ordered the item I paid for next day delivery
Review.Contenu: Having ordered the item I paid for next Day delivery but didn't get it next day even though I paid and processed the order before the dead line.
very very poor packaging, damage to the shredder, plastic siding broken in various places.....no damage protection at all.....

Review.Titre: These people need to learn some VERY…
Review.Contenu: These people need to learn some VERY BASIC communication skills! I placed an order with them a couple of days ago and paid via PayPal. Got a payment confirmation from PayPal, but no order confirmation from the retailer. I phoned them to ensure they had received my order and informed them that they had not sent any confirmation, all I received was a copy of the PayPal payment! Believe me, I already knew I'd paid them, just wanted an order acknowledgement! As I'd opted to create an account with them, I tried to log into said account but couldn't as I hadn't responded to an email confirmation message which they 'should' have sent, but hadn't! I requested a resend no less than 5 times, but still haven't received it! Emailed these guys to complain about their lacklustre customer care, but guess what... ... yes,  correct,  they haven't responded!!! Remains to be seen if they are capable of fulfilling my order, but performance to date is not promising...
Ordered on Monday with two working day standard delivery and my item will be delivered a week later!!!

Review.Titre: Ordered this part as its advertised 2…
Review.Contenu: Ordered this part as its advertised 2 day delivery its been a week now and the job is done

Review.Titre: No confirmation email of order from …
Review.Contenu: No confirmation email of order from supplier received, until day they were sending order.
Item was not received, seller acknowledged mistake, requested refund and it was given.
The item ordered was received damaged. Photos have been last week. Awaiting response.
Used product recieved poor customer service wont be using again

Review.Titre: Tool was reconditioned and part broken
I still have not received my item and…
Review.Contenu: I still have not received my item and the transaction has been deducted from my visa card. I have no correspondence from the company to say whether item has been sent yet or not. I have been contacted now by the company since trustpilot review and emailing the company via online website. Seemingly delay of parcel arrival is due to postal strike according to Campbell Miller representative. I have been advised that my order should now arrive possibly tomorrow, 31st December or next week between 3 - 4th January. Considering it is a small run company I will upgrade my review to 3 stars. I just want my purchased item to arrive.
Ordered an item that stated 2 working days delivery.Received an e mail several days later saying none in stock and they could't deliver.

Very fast dispatch an delivery, appreciated.However the Bosch case insert, (6.082.850.6EA), was poorly packaged, other than a plastic bag, there was no protection and the insert was split in two places. As it did not fit my 136 case properly, I had to alter the insert to fit, so did not bother to complain. But with transport companies not taking too much care, secure packaging would be essential, so not impressed with that aspect.

Review.Titre: On Looking at what is in the box it…
Review.Contenu: On Looking at what is in the box it says that there is a BM1 but the ceiling clamp is missing.  According to Bosch it is sold with the BM1 but not according to Campbell Miller - very disappointing.WHATS IN THE BOX•	3 601 K63 800•	L-BOXX inlay for tool•	L-BOXX 136 (1 600 A00 1RR)•	Laser target plate•	BM 1 Professional universal mount (0 601 015 A01)•	4 x 1.5 V LR6 (AA) batteries•	EAN: 3165140662482

Bought couplings for a dremel tool to replace one that failed. Website said pack of five which I thought would leave me some spares. Package received only had one. As the five pack was the reason to select Campbell Miller I felt a little let down - but in fairness it was the price that others were selling one coupling for too. Otherwise they did a good job and the dremel is repaired.

Ordered an item that stated 2 working days delivery.Received an e mail several days later saying none in stock and they could't deliver.Offered a refund "straight away" 4 days back and still waiting.Other outlets seem to be selling the same item so dissapointed they couldn't fulfill the order.The vendor has now corrected the situation.

A chapter of errors. First, wrong item was sent just before I was going on holiday. I reported it immediately, and was told to phone again to arrange a collection date. I requested that the correct item be sent and after waiting nearly a week, I chased it to be told that the order had been cancelled and a refund processed. Had to raise another online order. Seemed to expect customer to do the chasing and sorting out.

Ordered item 13th received confirmation . order cancelled 15th I queried the cancellation 17th was told it was because payment card address and delivery address do not match and they can only deliver to card address.If this is such a rigid requirement why was I able to make an order and then suffer the disappointment and frustration of an avoidable problem.Perhaps somebody should rethink the online order system a popup that's points out the card address has to match delivery address might be helpfull

I was told product was not in stock after I had  paid and ordered - despite EBay showing to the contrary at the time of order. I was offered an alternative which was presented as an upgrade to the one ordered but at the same price. As it turned out, t was a lower specification so I declined.Communication was quick and courteous and my refund was issued immediately. However, stock control system needs improvement to avoid disappointments !

My order was initially cancelled because of a fraud check even though all my information was correct, how ever I do understand this. Secondly I paid for express delivery before 12 and it turned up at 3!! Which wasn’t very helpful. And then when they did turn up the security seal on the Bosch boxes was broken, I called them and they said someone would call me back... still waiting!

Review.Titre: Good Service, but a mistake when delivering
Review.Contenu: The customer service was good, and when I called the person answering the phone was very polite and assisted me with my order. I asked for my parcel to be delivered on the Monday as I would be home that day and this was agreed, but instead my parcel was delivered on the Saturday when I was not at home and my husband received the parcel, which meant the suprise for his gift was ruined. but otherwise I would recommend the service

Review.Titre: Easily took my money but the delivery …
Review.Contenu: Easily took my money but the delivery was delayed a day. Stayed in all day on the day promised and then had to have it left outside on the next day. Packaging awful. The bits had rattled around inside and some of the smaller bits were broken. Not a show stopper but a bit sloppy. It all shows a bit of a don't care atitude.Probabaloy go somwewhere else next time. Might add though that their prfice was ten quid less than the rest so perhaps they are a quick and nasty crowd!!Cheers david

Ordered a Bosch battery charger which arrived promptly but sadly was non-functioning ( confirmed by a technician at Ernest Doe ). I was able to contact CM easily by ‘phone, where an apologetic employee told me that, upon receipt of the faulty charger, he told me CM would not only replace it, but do so with an upgraded model. I await the arrival of said charger having returned the faulty one a couple of days ago.Provided the predicted outcome is forthcoming I would regard my experience as initially problematic but satisfactory in conclusion. May I suggest in future that the company checks whether an item is functioning before sending it for delivery. Many thanks.

Review.Titre: The service was great as usual, did not get quite what I expected.
Review.Contenu: The service was great as usual, delivered sooner than expected. Problem is that I was expecting a bit more in the box. I ordered a bare Bosch plainer with box. There were 5 codes for what was in the box but no descriptions of the items. On opening the box I found that the chippings collection bag was missing, so only 3 items, Tool, box and inlay, Dont know what the other 2 codes are for, Contacted CM Tools, got reply saying that I had recieved all that should be included and that I could buy a bag for around £22, sounds like a con to me as this item was always included in the past, A bare tool means without batteries or charger.  Shame!

Campbell Miller Tools have an excellent website and good inventory of tools. The only problem was that the parts I ordered on the 29th November were not delivered until the 7th December despite have a Royal Mail 24 hour delivery stamp on them.

I ordered Busch lawnmower battery charger and was supplied with a different model without any explanation. Rang to ask if replacement was compatible with my existing battery. Was told I had probably been given an upgrade. Turns out the "upgrade" was cheaper than the model I ordered. No sign of a refund!

DisappointedBosch GRL 500HV After ordering from CM Tools through amazon, I got a phone call that there was going to be a delay on the delivery. I needed the item urgently, had to hire prior to re-ordering from CM Tools website. If you ain't got it don't advertise it.

Review.Titre: Not good really item was available on…
Review.Contenu: Not good really item was available on website but day after I ordered  it was delayed because item not in stock? Then tried to blame bosc h for delay which I think was down to Campbell Miller not checking stock properly won't be using again and hopefully got refund .

I paid next day delivery, 2 of my friends was at home aware of delivery but nothing came driver just left miss note, didn't even bother to knock or ring. I asked for refund of next day delivery but no answer.

Delivery was excellent! But when I emailed with a question about the product, they didn't know and referred me to the manufacturer. I'd have thought they might have known. To be fair, they did reply very swiftly. So apart from that, the service was excellent.

The only thing I would Say is that the chat service is very slow it took me about 15 minutes to actually talk to someone. Also slightly confusing on a couple of products as they both had the exact same place picture and description but other than that very excellent

Good service and competitive price. However, the goods were slightly damaged on delivery and 48 hours after reporting the damage, I have not yet had a response or replacement part.Two weeks after my complaint and review, and despite several telephone conversations with the company, I am still waiting for the replacement part for the damaged part on delivery. No one has been in touch to let me know when to expect the replacement part. Very poor after sales service. Once they get your money, they don’t want to know. I have contacted Bosch regarding this and they are going to resolve the issue directly.

Review.Titre: Confusion over tracking of my package…
Review.Contenu: Confusion over tracking of my package Between Campbell Miller Tools, DPD and Royal Mail. I asked for clarification from CMT, still no reply to this day. I informed CMT that I had received my package. No acknowledgment to date.

I had a problem ordering by phone as only one person who was unavailable could answer my question about a saw blade. Was told they would ring me, which they did several days later. By this time I had given up and ordered online without a problem

We have had appalling service from DPD. I received notification of delivery time and waited in. I then received notification that the driver couldn't find the property. I had three other visits today. Each one rang and asked for instructions and all three arrived without problem. The reason I say this was appalling as exactly the same thing happened last week. DPD said they couldn't find the address and we are still waiting for that delivery as well. It is sloppy. The product when eventually delivered was assembled easily and has worked well. I therefore have no complaint against Campbell Miller Tools. Their price was attractive as well.

Ordered my drill on Thursday 5:30am and didn't receive it till the following Thursday. Once I emailed them to ask what was happening with my drill. Suddenly it was being dispatched that same day.  I think someone forgot.

Campbell Miller were unable to fulfil my order and cancelled after 2 days, despite the item being shown in stock. Having paid by Paypal, the refund will not become available for another week. This is the second of two orders I placed in the last few months for which Campbell Miller have not been able to meet their delivery promise, leading me to suspect that they tend to buy in to fulfil orders rather than hold the stock themselves.In response to Campbell Miller's reply below, the time between order acknowledgement and refund being processed was 41 hours, not "inside 24 hours" as they claim. The refund then didn't become available on my Paypal account for a further 5 working days.

Review.Titre: Good price, good product, but delivered two days late
Review.Contenu: I chose Campbell Miller Tools as they offered a good price and a next day delivery option. I ordered well before their cut-off time, paying extra for next day delivery. This was important, as I had booked off the following two days from work to do some building work at home. When I contacted them the next day, they offered no explanation or apology, but gave me the option to to cancel the order or to send it a day late and refund the extra delivery charge. I chose to continue with the purchase, as I needed the item the next day. In fact the item didn't arrive until 2 days later, three quarters of the way through my project. Luckily, I was able to make do with tools I already had, but not without additional time and effort.

Review.Titre: I'm not happy with the shipping service
Review.Contenu: Luckily all parcels delivered.I'm not happy with the shipping service and how you packed the item. Bosch FSN Guide Rail Kit have come slightly bent, they work anyway, but they seem to be second-hand.

Review.Titre: I was sent the wrong pack of tools
Review.Contenu: I was sent the wrong pack of tools.  Ordered  ceramic tile blades and got wood ones.  I rang to get them changed and they were meant to send me an email to answer tobut it never came.

Review.Titre: I have received a Bosch nano blade from…
Review.Contenu: I have received a Bosch nano blade from Campbell miller tools, however this was a 50mm not a 65mm as was ordered not a happy bunny.i sent an e mail and a chat but no reply.thank you.

Item arrived quickly and was well packaged. My only bugbear was that I was charged £13.95 plus vat for postage to Northern Ireland for an item costing £157.08 plus vat. This is despite a prominent advert on the home page of their website which stated free delivery to UK. The last time I checked Northern Ireland was part of the UK. I rang customer services and they advised that the postage charge for off-shore addresses would have been applied before I completed the ordering process. I pointed out that I had not noticed this at the time and had decided to purchase from them as other sites offering free postage to Northern Ireland were slightly more expensive. Campbell Miller declined to reimburse the postage costs but amended the website advert re to mainland UK within minutes of my call.

Review.Titre: I received the wrong item - resolved
Review.Contenu: I received the wrong item. no response to my emailEdit:after leaving an opinion, a representative of the company contacted me and the problem of bad goods was solved
When you do eventually get your product it's first class. But everything I've ordered I get an email apologising for the lack of stock. Not a massive issue just annoying

Review.Titre: Bosch GST 18 V-LI B Cordless Jigsaw bare. carton
Review.Contenu: The price was good compered to others, but the item I bought arrived with missing part. the missing part arrived 2 weeks later After calling campbell miller tools 3 times.

Review.Titre: I had a few issues with their website…
Review.Contenu: I had a few issues with their website and placing the order. Order now placed, but still awaiting delivery of item almost a week later.

Review.Titre: Product was in stock when I ordered and …
Review.Contenu: Product was in stock when I ordered and received notification that delivery would be the next day - great! I wasn't able to receive the delivery, so delayed it by 1 day, which seemed to mean that CMT delayed shipping by a day resulting in them no longer having any stock - hmmm, I guess it's all about cash flow, but still. However, new stock arrived in time and the order was dispatched the day before the item was to be delivered, but not sure whether it was dispatched too late but delivery didn't then happen on the day they said it would; it arrived the following day. I did get quick replies to my emails and they did agree to a Saturday delivery without the extra charge if the new stock didn't arrive in time. Was the late delivery a courier problem? Who knows. I'd order from CMT again, but as with any online retailer, "in stock" when you order doesn't mean an item will still be available when you want it delivered.
Did not get what I wanted as computer system went wrong and lost my order so went somewere else that was more reliable

Review.Titre: Wasn't able to recognise my buisiness …
Review.Contenu: Wasn't able to recognise my buisiness card so had to use alternative card other than that great service and delivery
Ordered the item which was meant to arrive today for a job I had planned. Problem with it so coming tomorrow. Job lost.
product good  , but on advert it says delivery with royal mail . but got yodel , will say no more .

Review.Titre: Tool arrived in open plastic bag the …
Review.Contenu: Tool arrived in open plastic bag the welds on the bag having failed VERY POOR SERVICE.Sent E Mail NO REPLY !!

Review.Titre: Product great and well packed, but delivery process a nightmare
Review.Contenu: Told it was next day delivery, so specified my office address as the location I'd be that day. On the day in question I received a DPD text saying it would be delivered the following day - when I wouldn't be there to receive it!I was then bounced between CMT and DPD in the futile attempt to change the delivery to my home address (the billing address) but I was told by DPD that only CMT could do this. I called CMT to be told that all they could do was send an email to DPD advising them of the address change, but could not guarantee they would read it!!!Next day I called DPD to be advised the delivery was still scheduled for my office address and they had no record of an email, but if received, they would hold the delivery at their depot for 24 hours and then deliver it to my home address a day later, when you guessed it, I wouldn't be there.I then pleaded with the DPD agent to PLEASE ensure that it continued to my office address where I had to arrange for someone to receive it.It arrived in good condition, but what an absolute nightmare of a process when it should be very simple task to change the delivery to my home address, that was in fact associated to the credit card I used.

Review.Titre: Was told item that i ordered was not…
Review.Contenu: Was told item that i ordered was not available, told all items had been tested and were faulty ?
Fine until they repeatedly start bugging you to leave a review
Great initial service, ability to deal with problems not quite as good.

Review.Titre: avoid DPD delivery service, poor customer service
Review.Contenu: I am very disappointed from their delivery service provided by DPD delivery company. I waited more than 3 weeks for my parcel and at the end got a refund. There was no compensation for this massive waste of time or no apology from DPD or from the online retailer. I paid for an angle grinder, with expected delivery in few days. For 2 weeks, their chosen delivery -DPD claimed various reasons for missing deliveries. I have sent several emails advising their managers that I have workers and family living on site and there are 2  front CCTV cameras, 24/7. There was no DPD driver visiting or leaving a missed  delivery card, as they claimed on their website tracking links. On the third week, a DPD driver finally visited our house, again on the CCTV footage, it showed him refusing to give the parcel to my elderly mum in law, as she wanted to check the label before signing for it. In order to help address their poor customer service, I have suggested to CMT and DPD ijn all my emails to inspect my CCTV records. Before the refund, I asked to get this item collected from a safe shop on their list. Surprisingly, they refused to deliver to that shop, claiming it was closed because a car had crashed into their front window. I visited this shop and that accident did occur few weeks ago, but the store was open for business and had received few DPD items for collection in last few days. . I hope this information would be helpful for many customers and they will think twice before agreeing to use DPD as a delivery service.

Review.Titre: Hi I am still waiting on a missing part…
Review.Contenu: Hi I am still waiting on a missing part Bosch 1 600 A00 RV6

Review.Titre: Item all good but did not get next day…
Review.Contenu: Item all good but did not get next day delivery as advertised
As advertised. No notice of delivery. Left with neighbour
Advert was misleading. As thay should state it comes with

Review.Titre: Product looked second hand but works…
Review.Contenu: Product looked second hand but works accordingly.

Review.Titre: My order was received with no problems.
Ordered product that they had no stock…
Review.Contenu: Ordered product that they had no stock of.
hassle free experience with a sensible price.

Review.Titre: Fantastic experience with Campbell Miller Tools
Review.Contenu: I had a fantastic experience with Campbell Miller Tools! Their products are top-notch, and the customer service is exceptional. The tools I purchased were of excellent quality and exceeded my expectations. What sets them apart is their commitment to customer satisfaction. The staff was knowledgeable and helpful, assisting me in finding the perfect tools for my needs. The prices were competitive, making it a great value for the quality I received. I highly recommend Campbell Miller Tools to anyone in need of reliable, high-quality tools. It's a company I trust and will continue to support for all my tool-related needs.

This business, Campbell Miller Tools Home Services, is excellent. They assisted me with organising and cleaning my home. Everyone who needs assistance in their home should contact them, in my opinion.
Bought jigsaw blades online and received them promptly.The first blade cut cleanly through plywood, and is good for lots more.Will certainly recommend Campbell Miller tools.

Review.Titre: Ordered the tool Friday whilst on the…
Review.Contenu: Ordered the tool Friday whilst on the job fitting a bath for a customer tall arrived Monday morning very pleased with the service.
Tools provided were just what I was looking for but one important piece was missing otherwise its top marks.

Review.Titre: Placed an order that did not  complete…
Review.Contenu: Placed an order that did not  complete got a call from customer services and placed a new order shame that the courier is crap, Evri new Hermes still crap service 4 days in and still no delivery.
Brought this for my sister in law who has macular degeneration, she's happy with it. Not the usual use but it worked.

Review.Titre: Every order I placed was delivered…
Review.Contenu: Every order I placed was delivered swiftly and securely, ensuring that I received my tools in perfect condition.
All very good, site easy to use and goods delivered when they were estimated to, no complaints
Genuine Bosch partDelivered in 5 days including weekend/bank holiday no postage charge. Excellent service.
Unusual sized saw blade provided swiftly and at a reasonable price

Review.Titre: All good except a two day promised…
Review.Contenu: All good except a two day promised delivery became three
It’s a battery that was delivered quickly. It does what you expect.

Review.Titre: Router blues. Needed tool next day and it came as…
Review.Contenu: Needed tool next day and it came as expected price was okay and would use again

Review.Titre: The right product at a good price will…
Review.Contenu: The right product at a good price will by again from this supplier
Right part, right price, one star off because I paid for next day and DPD where a day late

Review.Titre: A very helpful guy on the phone
Review.Contenu: A very helpful guy on the phone, and very prompt delivery.
Arrived quickly, well packaged.

Review.Titre: Ordered Bosch GKS 18 V-57 G and FSN…
Review.Contenu: Ordered Bosch GKS 18 V-57 G and FSN guide rail kit, which I am pleased with.Only grip is that at the top of their website, they have "FREE DELIVERY TO UK MAINLAND" and "PLACE ORDER BY 14:00 for delivery on x", which suggests free next-day delivery. Even when spending over £500, the free delivery is 2 working days and the next-day delivery is an extra £6.95. To me, this is deceitful.My items were ordered on the 2nd and not delivered until 7th. 5 days, although this was January, so I'll cut them some slack.Oh, and their website needs a speed boost.

Review.Titre: Phoned the company for advise and it…
Review.Contenu: Phoned the company for advise and it was nice to speak to open, knowledgeable people, saved quite a bit of money on a Bosch charger, which arrived very promptly, thank you!The only dissapointment being that the battery I required was out of stock which is the way of the world these days unfortunately.I'm awaiting an e mail to advise me when the batteries land!

Chris, the telephone operator at Campbell Miller Tools,  answered my questions and carried out my request with no quibble and was courteous.  Very prompt sending of my parcel.  I received it next day. No hesitation in  ordering from them again in the future   This Company quoted  the cheapest online price for the product I required

Easy ordering. Delivered on time. Although the item is advertised as despatched in a cardboard box I thought it would be in the original Bosch box and the wrapped as per items I have ordered from other sites. Gives the impression that it is a used or refurbished item. Slightly disappointing.

Review.Titre: Helpful Staff who go out of their way
Review.Contenu: Helpful staff who go out of their way to try and resolve issues even ones beyond their control.  When matters go awry there is no hesitation to offer a refund but this not always the best solution.  If goods are faulty of wrongly sent/received then a full refund is given plus return costs once the those goods are returned in the condition originally sent.  I have found Campbell Miller to offer good customer service and value for money products.

Review.Titre: Pleased with the ordering system and…
Review.Contenu: Pleased with the ordering system and delivered on time but I think it should be made clear that the items are delivered in plain cardboard boxes and not branded. When I’ve ordered from other suppliers they have arrived in Bosch branded boxes. Still don’t know why yours differ?

Keen pricing, and dispatch of goods as promised. Overall service let down by an 'over-committed' delivery time.  "Next Day" is indicated, but this expectation was not met by DPD who took one day to get the goods to their central hub and then a further day to deliver the goods via the local centre.But I was pleased by the unexpected inclusion of additional saw blades that were not not listed in the "what's in the box".

Review.Titre: Product was as described and delivery…
Review.Contenu: Product was as described and delivery was prompt! Haven't had to return the item so I don't know what their return service is like hence the 4stars. Couldn't give 5stars without knowing how a company deals with me when I am unhappy and need to make a return...That's when you really find things out!

I would have given five stars but for one minor niggle. When I followed the link to track my order, it showed "Dispatched" but with no date. This obviously means that if the item has not arrived when expected (the main reason for needing to track an item), you do not know whether to contact the supplier or the carrier.As it happens, the item arrived within an hour of attempting track it so no harm done.Otherwise, very satisfied with product, price and service.

I ordered a plunge saw and guide rail from the web site , order arrived but no guid was sent after a few calls to find out why, I was told a error had been made and the guide should not have been included. I was originally offered one at cost but as I pointed out the price shown said guide was included.the decided to honour the product shown, I have now received my guide so thanks to Marcus for eventually sorting this out. It would have been five stars but for the sticky start sorting out my order being short.

Review.Titre: Rapid delivery of two packs of Bosch…
Review.Contenu: Rapid delivery of two packs of Bosch strimmer blades.Items were a tight fit in the jiffy bag they were sent inresulting in the sharp corners of the hard plastic bubble packs partially piercing the flap of the jiffy bag during transit. Suggest larger jiffy back in future or tape on sharp corners / edges of the packs. Also suggest enclosure slip is tapped to bubble packs.

Bosch power tool battery charger.  I bought replacement Bosch battery charger.  It arrived a few day later. It was competitively priced and the ordering process was straight forward.  The only concern I had was that it arrived in a plastic bag and inside the plastic bag the actually charger was wrapped up in a paper bag.  Fortunately the charger seems ok but the packaging really didn't offer any protection during the delivery process.  I would have expected some kind of cardboard box.

Review.Titre: Good price for the item i wanted
Review.Contenu: Good price for the item i wanted, delivery was very quick (and free!). Can not give 5* as i never had to contact them, which is good. I feel 5* is only given if you had to deal with the company and then only if they solved your problem to your satisfaction. But, i had no problems with this company (yet!) and would use them again.

Review.Titre: Order process simple and delivery at…
Review.Contenu: Order process simple and delivery at the soonest time indicated within the time indicated. I would use them again. Overall prices are competitive and have a good range. It was the best price I could find for the item I bought. Would have been five stars but I didn’t receive a reply from their ‘contact us’ page on the website about another item before placing my order so they missed an opportunity

Review.Titre: Bosch soft small tool  (12” x 9” x 3”)…
Review.Contenu: Bosch soft small tool  (12” x 9” x 3”) bag. Single zip opening, probably provided for Bosch 10.8/12 volt tools. Various elastic & Velcro straps inside, may be useful, maybe not! Nice carrying handle, but it depends on what you use it to hold, as to the value you get. I managed 2 x 12 volt drill/drivers & a mini charger. Another bag I’ve used for hand held test meters. I prefer “soft” tool containers. So if you shop around, you can get a nice little tool bag for a decent price. If the price is right for you, then I would recommend. MikeB

Excellent service, items received in good condition. Only slight negative being not receiving a despatch email as expected. Prompt response to email query and item received in line with their promise. Second time ordering from them, will use again. Recommended.

I would have given you 5 stars but for one reason. You don't seem to update your site very often as part of my order was out of stock and even after you have emailed me to tell me this, the very next day the item I ordered was still for sale on your site. Apart from that the prices are great and the delivery was excellent.

Everything worked well until I completed my order when every thing went off the screen - I didn't know if my order had been seen, lateron your reply came on to my computer and all was well - don't knowwhat happened but the battery was fine, Thanks

Review.Titre: Campbell Miller were excellent,shame about the deivery service
Review.Contenu: Campbell Miller were excellent, and my Bosch LI mower is brilliant.  It's a pity the same cannot be said about DPD Delivery Service who were dreadful.  On the scheduled delivery date they said nobody was at home to sign for the goods when both my wife and myself saw the delivery service van drive past our house with only the briefest of stops. As a result we had to re-schedule our arrangements to receive delivery the following day.

Review.Titre: One or two hiccups but overall a great experience
Review.Contenu: We had a couple of hiccups getting a lawnmower ordered and delivered, first because it was in and back out of stock quickly, and secondly when the courier failed to follow through.  The customer service guys were great and problems were solved, price was adjusted because I had to collect from the local depot instead of getting it delivered to my house

Have now placed several tool orders with Campbell-Miller, next day delivery by DPD (the best, know ±30min when it will arrive) and a very competitive price.Only glitch is that the latest version of the online ordering insists on trying to guess my address, gets it wrong, clears the details when corrected, then complains because the field is missing.

First time used, very happy. Email confirmation was quick and post out/ receipt was quick. Included a Vat receipt without having to ask for one which always makes life easier (most other companies can't be bothered doing this these days) so very happy to use again when chance arises.

Review.Titre: Very quick delivery time and good price
Review.Contenu: Item (a Bosch torch) was delivered incredibly quickly and was the cheapest I could find; very impressed.Loses a star because the item itself was possibly a customer return since the retail box was unsealed and the small bag used to store the torch was missing. I'm not bothered however because the item itself looks and works ok.

Review.Titre: Service was good and very fast
Review.Contenu: Service was good and very fast. The only issue i had was I didn't receive an email, order number etc and had to call to check order had been received. In fact the courier contacted me, so then I knew it was going ahead. It could have been because it was Saturday when I ordered it. It arrived on Tuesday btw.

Review.Titre: Quick delivery and very efficient. Impressed but.......
Review.Contenu: Great communication. Very quick delivery with an hour slot advised in advance on the day. Excellent prices but when delivered by DPD the box had been smashed about but fortunately the hedge trimmer was undamaged and surprisingly worked OK as I had expected with the level of damage it would not. This is not the fault of Campbell Millar but rough handling by DPD. Maybe they should consider more protective packaging and that is the only fault I can find. Would certainly use them again.

Review.Titre: Good service in an ailing packet!! Very good and delivered when they said…
Review.Contenu: Very good and delivered when they said they would with the goods that so far have worked well, very pleased. The only downside was the packaging was battered, re taped and obviously not new! Shame about the presentation, apart from that very good

Then found wrong model provided, almost the same, but a different version. Phoned and explained and pointed out the one sent was available for less elsewhere so came to an agreement on a partial refund. They did offer to take it back and give full refund, so fair play and the guy I talked to was very understanding and helpful. Will use them again.

The part I ordered arrived after a few days, but I did not see any tracking details so was unaware when the delivery would take place.  I heard a thud on the doormat as it was posted through the letterbox but not realising what it was.  I have yet to fit the part but everything looks OK to me.

Not bought much from cmt but overall a good experience. Andrew in internet sales knows his stuff. And always willing to helpI just wished they had packed my batteries and charger in there own boxes. Instead of all been in the lboxx which was sealed with bosch seal. Which points to cmt having bosch seals!

Review.Titre: An old sander that can't be fixed 🙈
Review.Contenu: I had an Bosch orbital sander with a hook & loop based and I wanted to replace it's base due to wear & tear. The guy I spoke with at Campbell Miller said he wasn't sure if the part they could supply would fit my sander. He suggested I try confirming with Bosch if the part would fit my model. I spoke with Bosch who were about as useful as an ashtray on a motorbike.I decided to take a punt on the part, but unfortunately when it came it didn't fit. So I'll have to have some wallet surgery and buy another.

Great customer service, they answered my questions quickly and delivery was quick too! Prices were very competitive.It would have been 5 stars but the high delivery cost to my post code lets them down. I use other online tool shops that are in London  and they don't charge delivery?

Review.Titre: Usual excellent swift service and great…

Review.Contenu: The lamp was fine and good quality. The ordering process was easy and delivery within expectations. Was disappointed that between ordering and despatch the product had a price reduction but I was still charged the original price.

Review.Titre: Great, but could have been better...

When I phoned, I was informed the models were in fact the same, but manufacturer had just updated the model name. The old 2.0ah batteries had been replaced with the newer 2.5ah ones. I ordered the new model name and should have been informed of this change at the time of purchase. The models had in fact changed a long time ago...so this was older stock being shifted. All resolved quickly, but shouldn't have happened...and mars an otherwise straightforward and pleasant transaction.

Review.Titre: Very good price and quick delivery

Review.Titre: I'm very pleased with the item I …

Review.Titre: Wrong item sent - so not 5 star service - but mistake promptly rectified...
Review.Contenu: Ordered an SDS MAX tarmac spade chisel and was sent a standard hex-fit chisel - nothing like the one I ordered. Picker had signed the delivery note to say item had been checked prior to dispatched - so quite annoyed!After complaining, by email, I received a courteous call from Customer Services apologising for the mistake and ensuring the correct item was immediately dispatched by 24-hr courier service. Seeing how quickly a company resolves a problem is always a good test of its professionalism. So, ten out of ten for Campbell Miller for promptly resolving the issue...and for restoring my faith in customer services! And to the picker: "No more late nights out...or maybe time for a trip to Specsavers?"

Great product.  Reasonable website layout. Product info was not as complete as it could be and one item could not be searched for. I think I found it by chance. Excellent delivery time frame which was free. VERY good.

The courier did not deliver the product on the day promised or as confirmed on the text updates we received.  Which was important as we were in the process of moving in to our new house and so left someone in to receive the delivery. We received our delivery a few days later after the weekend. Overall no dramas and we got there in the end. Keep up the great customer service, I would definitely buy again.

I've ordered a few products from Campbell Miller (mostly Bosch Professional stuff) and have been impressed with both the prices and range of items on offer.  Delivery has all been via a next day courier (either Parcel Force or DPD) and the items have showed up when expected (including the delivery slot allocated).The first item I ordered was showing as in stock on the website but was actually out of stock however I was kept informed about the progress of the order and instead of receiving it Wednesday I got it the Monday (3 working days later).  Once they realised a delay was likely, they immediately contacted me and gave me the option to proceed with the order or cancel it and get a full refund.  I chose to proceed and have subsequently ordered a few items from them.I'm more than happy to recommend them and use them again myself. The four stars is only because of the out of stock item showing as in stock.  I would have gone 4.5 or 4.9 if I could.

I generally find Campbell Miller competitively priced and the customer service is fantastic. Quite a few  Bosch professional power tools purchased. I would have given 5 stars, however, following an attempt to purchase an item which became unavailable due to high demand (I bought it through their online service but then received a courteous email to say the item had been refunded due to not having enough stock) and then increasing in price when back in stock, I feel only four stars can be rewarded.  When the item became available again the price increased from £99 to £150, and the customer service representative did not offer a reasonable explanation. Frankly, I feel somewhat disgruntled by the huge increase in price. It will not stop me from buying from Campbell Miller again, I just feel that, on this occasion, they have taken liberty with the fact that the item I wanted is in high demand and have, therefore, increased the price. Not the most professional of business etiquette and i will be more cautious in the future. Just to reiterate, this is the first time this has happened and I have generally been satisfied with everything.

This company use DPD and as usual I wasn't given a time slot and they were returning to the depot with my item at 12.15 without having attempted delivery. 2 calls by me and one from Campbell Miller resulted in the driver being turned around and the delivery made. I would have awarded 5 out of 5 but I felt I shouldn't have needed to get back on to DPD once I notified Campbell Miller of the problem but they didn't want to play ping pong between me and DPD once they had achieved getting the driver turned around. Items are delivered half a mile from my door because I live remote up a track. As DPD didn't give me a time slot I asked that the driver call me when the package was left in the open at the bottom of my track. I asked so the expensive item wouldn't be left unattended too long and because it was raining. Needless to say DPD didn't bother ringing so it's just as well I went to check before it got too wet.
